name: Positioned
desc: A widget that controls where a child of a [Stack] is positioned.

fields.name: left
fields.desc: The distance that the child's left edge is inset from the left of the stack.

fields.name: top
fields.desc: The distance that the child's top edge is inset from the top of the stack.

fields.name: right
fields.desc: The distance that the child's right edge is inset from the right of the stack.

fields.name: bottom
fields.desc: The distance that the child's bottom edge is inset from the bottom of the stack.

nodes.name: Basic Usage of Positioned
desc: 【top】: Distance to the top of the parent   【double】
【right】: Distance to the right of the parent   【double】
【left】: Distance to the left of the parent   【double】
【bottom】: Distance to the bottom of the parent   【double】
